original: @214a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @214a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shri badzra bhee ra ba p'a ni na aa pa na shuddha n'a ma /
analyzed: shri badzra bhee ra ba p'a ni na aa pa na shuddha n'a ma /
translated: śrī-vajrabhairavapāṇyāpanasudhā-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Purity of the Implements of Glorious Vajrabhairava

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Lion's Roar of the Lord of the World.

original: ma rig pa gcod pas gri gug / gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa gcod pas gri gug / gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa /
translated: The curved knife cuts through ignorance, the single-pronged vajra conquers the concepts of subject and object,

original: dran pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pas gtun shing /
analyzed: dran pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pas gtun shing /
translated: the pestle destroys the afflictions of mindfulness,

original: sred pa gcod par byed pas chu gri'o //
analyzed: sred pa gcod par byed pas chu gri'o //
translated: the razor cuts through craving,

original: lus ngag gi nyes pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: lus ngag gi nyes pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: the single-pronged vajra conquers the faults of body and speech,

original: phrag dog 'joms pas sta re'o //
analyzed: phrag dog 'joms pas sta re'o //
translated: the axe conquers jealousy,

original: lta ba ngan pa 'joms pas mdung ngo //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa 'joms pas mdung ngo //
translated: the spear conquers bad views,

original: dbang gi las byed pas mda'o //
analyzed: dbang gi las byed pas mda'o //
translated: the arrow performs the action of subjugation,

original: 'gugs pas lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: 'gugs pas lcags kyu'o //
translated: the goad attracts,

original: las kyi sgrib pa 'joms par byed pas dbyug to'o //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa 'joms par byed pas dbyug to'o //
translated: the club conquers the obscurations of karma,

original: kha tv'am ga ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The Khatvanga is the very nature of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: shes bya'i @214b sgrib pa gcod pa ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: shes bya'i @214b sgrib pa gcod pa ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel severs the obscurations of the knowable.

original: ye shes lnga ro ma nyams par gyur pas bdag nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ro ma nyams par gyur pas bdag nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is one's own nature, since the taste of the five intuitions is not spoiled.

original: mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'joms pas rdo rje tho ba'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'joms pas rdo rje tho ba'o //
translated: The vajra-hammer destroys the obscurations of ignorance.

original: ral gri'i dngos grub ster bas na ral gri'o //
analyzed: ral gri'i dngos grub ster bas na ral gri'o //
translated: The sword is the sword which grants success.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul bas cang te'u'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul bas cang te'u'o //
translated: The hand-drum is the sound of supreme ecstasy, which summons all the Buddhas.

original: bde ba chen po dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa'o //
translated: The skull filled with the various [substances] is the nature of great bliss and great compassion.

original: sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o //
translated: The head of Brahma is the destruction of all obscurations.

original: bdud las rgyal ba'i rang bzhin gyi phub po //
analyzed: bdud las rgyal ba'i rang bzhin gyi phub po //
translated: The armor is the nature of victory over Mara.

original: sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad du rtogs pa'i rang bzhin med pas rkang pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad du rtogs pa'i rang bzhin med pas rkang pa'o //
translated: The feet are the nature of the realization of all beings and all things as without intrinsic reality.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes 'ching bas zhags pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes 'ching bas zhags pa'o //
translated: The noose is the binding of the true intuition.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas na gzhu'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas na gzhu'o //
translated: The bow is because of conquering the three worlds.

original: stong pa nyid kyis na rgyu ma'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis na rgyu ma'o //
translated: The arrow is because of emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dril bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dril bu'o //
translated: The bell is the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad byed pa po nyid kyis lag pa'o //🔽chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis na dur khrod kyi ras so //
analyzed: chos thams cad byed pa po nyid kyis lag pa'o // chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis na dur khrod kyi ras so //
translated: The hands are because of all phenomena being agents.🔽The charnel ground cloth is because of the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis phug pa nyid kyis skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis phug pa nyid kyis skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa'o //
translated: The impaled man is because of the cave of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad 'od gsal ba nyid kyis na me thab bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'od gsal ba nyid kyis na me thab bo //
translated: The fire pit is because of the luminosity of all phenomena.

original: dam tshig dag pa nyid kyis na thod pa btung bas bkang ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dag pa nyid kyis na thod pa btung bas bkang ba'o //
translated: The skull cup filled with blood is because of the purity of the pledge.

original: bdud rnams bsdigs pa nyid kyis sdigs mdzub bo //
analyzed: bdud rnams bsdigs pa nyid kyis sdigs mdzub bo //
translated: The threatening gesture is because of threatening the māras.

original: sku gsung thugs rnams ro gcig pa nyid kyis 'phan rtse gsum pa'i //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs rnams ro gcig pa nyid kyis 'phan rtse gsum pa'i //
translated: The three-pointed banner is because of the single taste of body, speech, and mind.

original: chos thams cad 'od gsal sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan no //🔽rmongs pa'i glang po dral bas na /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'od gsal sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan no // rmongs pa'i glang po dral bas na /
translated: The flag moved by the wind is because of the luminosity of all phenomena, which is like an illusion.

original: glang po'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: glang po'i pags pa'o //
translated: The elephant skin is because of the elephant of delusion being split.

original: zhabs g-yas kyi gdan brgyad ni dngos grub chen po brgyad rnams par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs g-yas kyi gdan brgyad ni dngos grub chen po brgyad rnams par dag pa'o //
translated: The eight seats of the right legs are the purities of the eight great siddhis.

original: mig sman ri lu /
analyzed: mig sman ri lu /
translated: Eye ointment,

original: ral gri gser 'gyur /
analyzed: ral gri gser 'gyur /
translated: mercury,

original: bcud len rkang byug / so 'og /
analyzed: bcud len rkang byug / so 'og /
translated: elixir, foot ointment,

original: phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: and the great seal.

original: zhabs g-yon rnams kyi gdan ni bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad ni dbang phyug brgyad rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: zhabs g-yon rnams kyi gdan ni bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad ni dbang phyug brgyad rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The eight seats of the left legs, such as the vulture, are the purities of the eight masteries.🔽Desire,

original: 'dod pa rmongs pa //🔽khro ba ser sna /🔽'jigs pa grags gtsang smre /
analyzed: 'dod pa rmongs pa // khro ba ser sna / 'jigs pa grags gtsang smre /
translated: anger,🔽fear,

original: ngo tsha ba phra ma /
analyzed: ngo tsha ba phra ma /
translated: shame,🔽and the three realms.

original: khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag nyid kyis ma he'i gdong pa can no //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag nyid kyis ma he'i gdong pa can no //
translated: He has the face of a buffalo because he is the lord of the three realms.

original: rva gnyis kyis bden pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rva gnyis kyis bden pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The two horns are the purities of the two truths.

original: mkhas pa chen po ta th'a ga ta rakshi tas mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po ta th'a ga ta rakshi tas mdzad pa'o //
translated: It was composed by the great scholar Tathagataraksita.

original: au to bo pa ti dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba mal gyo blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: au to bo pa ti dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba mal gyo blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so /
translated: It was translated by the Indian abbot Bodhibhadra and the Tibetan translator Malgyo Lodro.
